alert.note: Alert for Bastrop; Caldwell; Hays; Travis; Williamson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Air Quality Alert issued June 06 at 2:16PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...OZONE ACTION DAY... The Texas Commission on Environmental Quality (TCEQ) has issued an Ozone Action Day for the Austin area for Wednesday, June 7, 2023. Atmospheric conditions are expected to be favorable for producing high levels of ozone air pollution in the Austin area on Wednesday. You can help prevent ozone pollution by sharing a ride, walking or riding a bicycle, taking your lunch to work, avoiding drive through lanes, conserving energy, and keeping your vehicle properly tuned. If required, the next Ozone Action Day will be issued by 3 PM on Wednesday, June 7, 2023. && For more information on ozone: Ozone: The Facts www.tceq.texas.gov/airquality/monops/ozonefacts.html EPA Air Now www.airnow.gov/index.cfm?action=airnow.local_state&stateid=45&tab=0 Take Care of Texas www.takecareoftexas.org Capital Area Council of Governments Air Quality www.capcog.org/divisions/regional-services/air-quality Clean Air Force of Central Texas www.cleanairforce.org
